item.thingamajig.thingamajig.desc:
It does something. Perhaps useful. 
And maybe it won't kill you.
item.thingamajig.thingamajig.config.dela: Delay between repair ticks, higher is slower repair
item.thingamajig.thingamajig.config.mode: Repair modes: 0 = All Slots, 1 = Hotbar Only, 2 = Main Inventory Only, 3 = Armor & Shield Only
